Dear {!Contact.Name},
Congratulations on reaching another milestone in your career with us! We want to express our appreciation for your hard work, loyalty, and dedication over the past year. Your contributions have made a significant impact on our company's success, and we are grateful for all that you do.
We look forward to continuing our partnership and achieving even greater things in the future. Once again, congratulations on your work anniversary!
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
